oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Homecoming - "Blast 'Em Bucs"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pirates; Homecomings; Floats (Parades); Flags; Ships
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
A 1970 homecoming float featured a cutlass-brandishing buccaneer in a ship, Bucky the Buccaneer being Christian Brothers College's mascot.
The game that year was played against Little Rock.
